system.description:
This spell requires one minute to cast and targets up three creatures per caster rank, freeing them from enchantments, transmutations and curses. On a raise, you also reverse spells with an Instant duration, and free creatures from the effects of cursed magic items (although the items themselves remain cursed).
 Spells that cannot be dispelled with Dispel Magic are only affected by this spell if their rank does not exceed Veteran.
system.rank: Seasoned (Holy Champion and Spellsinger) or Veteran (Mage, Priest and Fate Sphere)
